events.name: onClose
events.description: Callback fired when the select popover is closed.
events.description_zh: 关闭选择弹出框时触发回调。

events.name: onOpenChange
events.description: Callback fired when the select popover is opened or closed.
events.description_zh: 打开或关闭选择弹出框时触发回调。

events.name: onSelectionChange
events.description: Callback fired when the selected keys change.
events.description_zh: 当所选键更改时触发回调。

events.name: onChange
events.description: Native select change event, fired when the selected value changes.
events.description_zh: 本机选择更改事件，在所选值更改时触发。

events.name: renderValue
events.description: Function to render the value of the select. It renders the selected item by default.
events.description_zh: 用于呈现 select 值的函数。默认情况下，它呈现所选项目。

:children.description: The children to render. Usually a list of `SelectItem` and `SelectSection` elements.
:children.description_zh: 要呈现的子项。通常是“SelectItem”和“SelectSection”元素的列表。

:items.description_zh: select 中的 Item 对象。（动态）

selectionMode.description: The type of selection that is allowed in the collection.
selectionMode.description_zh: 集合中允许的选择类型。

selectedKeys.description: The currently selected keys in the collection (controlled).
selectedKeys.description_zh: 集合中当前选定的键（受控）。

disabledKeys.description: The item keys that are disabled. These items cannot be selected, focused, or otherwise interacted with.
disabledKeys.description_zh: 已禁用的项目键。无法选择、聚焦这些项目或以其他方式与之交互。

defaultSelectedKeys.description: The initial selected keys in the collection (uncontrolled).
defaultSelectedKeys.description_zh: 集合中初始选择的键（不受控制）。

color.type: default / primary / secondary / success / warning / danger

:label.description: The content to display as the label.

:description.description: A description for the select. Provides a hint such as specific requirements for what to choose.
:description.description_zh: 选择的说明。提供提示，例如选择内容的具体要求。

:errorMessage.description: An error message for the select.

:startContent.description: Element to be rendered in the left side of the select.
:startContent.description_zh: 要在 select 的左侧呈现的元素。

:endContent.description: Element to be rendered in the right side of the select.
:endContent.description_zh: 要在选择的右侧呈现的元素。

:selectorIcon.description: Element to be rendered as the selector icon.
:selectorIcon.description_zh: 要呈现为选择器图标的元素。

:scrollRef.description: A ref to the scrollable element.

:spinnerRef.description: A ref to the spinner element.

fullWidth.description: Whether the select should take up the width of its parent.
fullWidth.description_zh: 选择是否应占用其父项的宽度。

isOpen.description: Whether the select is open by default (controlled).
isOpen.description_zh: 默认情况下是否打开选择（受控）。

defaultOpen.description: Whether the select is open by default (uncontrolled).
defaultOpen.description_zh: 默认情况下是否打开选择（不受控制）。

isRequired.description: Whether user select is required on the select before form submission.
isRequired.description_zh: 在表单提交之前选择时是否需要用户选择。

isMultiline.description: Whether the select should allow multiple lines of text.
isMultiline.description_zh: 选择是否应允许多行文本。

validationState.description: Whether the select should display its "valid" or "invalid" visual styling. (**Deprecated**) use **isInvalid** instead.
validationState.description_zh: 选择项是否应显示其“有效”或“无效”的视觉样式。（**已弃用**）请改用 **isInvalid**。

showScrollIndicators.description: Whether the select should show scroll indicators when the listbox is scrollable.
showScrollIndicators.description_zh: 当列表框可滚动时，选择是否应显示滚动指示器。

autoFocus.description: Whether the select should be focused on the first mount.
autoFocus.description_zh: 是否应将选择集中在第一个挂载上。

disallowEmptySelection.description: Whether the collection allows empty selection.

disableAnimation.description: Whether the select should be animated.
disableAnimation.description_zh: 是否应对选择进行动画处理。

disableSelectionIconRotation.description: Whether the select should disable the rotation of the selector icon.
disableSelectionIconRotation.description_zh: 选择是否应禁用选择器图标的旋转。

:popoverProps.description: Props to be passed to the popover component.
:popoverProps.description_zh: 要传递给 popover 组件的 props。

:listboxProps.description: Props to be passed to the listbox component.
:listboxProps.description_zh: 要传递给列表框组件的 props。

:scrollShadowProps.description: Props to be passed to the scroll shadow component.
:scrollShadowProps.description_zh: 要传递给滚动阴影组件的 props。

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the dropdown item slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为下拉项槽设置自定义类名。

slots.name: base
slots.description: The main wrapper of the select. This wraps the rest of the slots.
slots.description_zh: select 的主包装器。这将包裹其余插槽。

slots.name: mainWrapper
slots.description: Wraps the helperWrapper and the trigger slots.
slots.description_zh: 包装 helperWrapper 和触发器槽。

slots.name: trigger
slots.description: The trigger of the select. This wraps the label the inner wrapper and the selector icon.
slots.description_zh: 选择的触发器。这将包装标签、内部包装器和选择器图标。

slots.name: innerWrapper
slots.description: The wrapper of the select content. This wraps the start/end content and the select value.
slots.description_zh: 所选内容的包装器。这将包装开始/结束内容和选择值。

slots.name: selectorIcon
slots.description: The selector icon of the select. This is the icon that rotates when the select is open (data-open).
slots.description_zh: 选择的选择器图标。这是在选择打开（数据打开）时旋转的图标。

slots.name: value
slots.description: The select value. This is also the slot that wraps the renderValue function result.
slots.description_zh: 选择值。这也是包装 renderValue 函数结果的插槽。

slots.name: listboxWrapper
slots.description: The wrapper of the listbox. This wraps the listbox component, this slot is used on top of the scroll shadow component.
slots.description_zh: 列表框的包装器。这包装了 listbox 组件，这个槽用在滚动阴影组件的顶部。

slots.name: listbox
slots.description: The listbox component. This is the component that wraps the select items.
slots.description_zh: 列表框组件。这是包装所选项的组件。

slots.name: popoverContent
slots.description: The popover content slot. Use this to modify the popover content styles.
slots.description_zh: 弹出框内容槽。使用它来修改弹出框内容样式。

slots.name: helperWrapper
slots.description: The wrapper of the helper text. This wraps the helper text and the error message.
slots.description_zh: 帮助程序文本的包装器。这将包装帮助程序文本和错误消息。

slots.name: errorMessage
slots.description: The error message of the select.
